Posts.EditableText: I just noticed that Quest 5.0.2. is released. I am searching the new while loop in the "Add new script"-tree but I cant find it there(should be between "Switch..." and "Call function").
Posts.HTML: I just noticed that Quest 5.0.2. is released. I am searching the new while loop in the "Add new script"-tree but I cant find it there(should be between "Switch..." and "Call function").

Posts.EditableText: That's because "while" is a Quest 5.1 feature!
Posts.HTML: That's because "while" is a Quest 5.1 feature!

Posts.EditableText: OK, this makes sense
